author: Greg
content: As long as you think of holding in terms of years, 2024 will probably go down as a good year to have accumulated MSFT.

author: Allison
content: Sold half my position at $420. Why? Diversification. MSFT is great, but no stock should dominate your portfolio. Keep it balanced, people

author: Ruby
content: Bought the dip at $405. Couldn’t resist with their fundamentals. Planning to hold for at least five years. This stock is a fortress

author: PurpleTag
content: Trash stock down everyday. Bag holder

author: Sierra
content: Microsoft's free cash flow is $110B. Let that sink in. They can weather any storm and still reward shareholders. Staying long here.

author: Nyla
content: Think $MSFT’s overvalued? Look at its AI integration pipeline. Copilot alone is worth billions in recurring revenue. Not selling anytime soon.

author: Victoria
content: MSFT is basically a tech ETF in one stock: cloud, gaming, software, AI. That diversification is why I’m all in.

author: Jacob
content: Microsoft isn’t just a stock. It’s a generational company. Buy dips, hold long, sleep easy.

author: Der kluge Albert
content: you know MSFT is going to skyrocket soon...
